Description :
Ruthless fighter single again goes on the warpath. Action of the second part of the popular action, gain recognition for the players around the world will unfold among impassable jungle, mountain ranges and urban ruins. Impressive selection of the most modern equipment includes thermal and night vision device that will significantly enhance your ability to eliminate the enemy.
As the first part of the game "Sniper. Ghost Warrior 2 "will offer various ways of achieving this goal. You have to choose your way to victory, whether fatal fire from a sniper rifle at long range or silent murder in the melee. But in any case it is necessary to take into account the incredibly realistic weather conditions and advanced ballistics. And remember: one shot - one kill! After snipers as sappers, wrong only once .


Solution for Language Problem
You dont't have to reinstall game if you have language problem
Do those basic steps
1) Go to your installation folder like C:Program Files (x86) or Program Files
.G. MechanicsSniper Ghost Warrior 2
2) Open "system.cfg" with noteped
3) Change those
g_language=russian
g_languageAudio=russian
to
g_language=english
g_languageAudio=english
